articles.author: Benjamin Njiri
articles.title: Bitcoin miners pivot to AI: New revenue stream post-halving? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Bitcoin miners are pivoting to the AI sector to stabilize and cover revenue shortfalls post-halving.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin miners are embracing AI as alternative revenues amidst a decline in mining income. 
  • Possible miner capitulations flash a BTC buy signal as spikes in Hash Ribbons persist.

Women better at sport during period, study suggests - BBC.com
articles.description: It could explain why women playing contact sports appear injury prone between ovulation and menstruation.
articles.content:
Aurelia Foster,Health reporter, BBC News
Sports injuries could be linked with fluctuating hormones during the menstrual cycle, researchers say
Sportswomen make fewer mistakes and have quicker react… [+2326 chars]
